testcase.name: Inspection Module E2E Tests › S0: Boot smoke - load "/" and assert FE renders

failure.message: inspection.spec.ts:64:7 S0: Boot smoke - load "/" and assert FE renders

testcase.name: Inspection Module E2E Tests › S1: Create Inspection - complete flow with VIN decode
Inspection Module E2E Tests › S2: Checklist Fill - comprehensive item completion
Inspection Module E2E Tests › S3: Save Draft and Resume - persistence verification
Inspection Module E2E Tests › S4: Finalize + Report - generate and validate report
Inspection Module E2E Tests › S5: FE↔BE Data Contract Assertions
Inspection Module E2E Tests › S6: Negative/Edge Cases
